languages.text: "Некоторые тайны могут кануть во мрак пустоты на века. Можно считать везением, что этот секрет династии все же был раскрыт".

traits.locale_text: "Некоторые тайны могут кануть во мрак пустоты на века. Можно считать везением, что этот секрет династии все же был раскрыт".

languages.text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые тайны могут кануть во мрак пустоты на века. Можно считать везением, что этот секрет династии все же был раскрыт".

traits.locale_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
"Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
"Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
"Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
"Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
"Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

languages.text: 「謎ってのは、何世紀ものあいだ虚空の中に消えちまうこともあるんだ。この王朝の秘密が掘り起こされたこと自体が幸運だったって考えるべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: 「謎ってのは、何世紀ものあいだ虚空の中に消えちまうこともあるんだ。この王朝の秘密が掘り起こされたこと自体が幸運だったって考えるべきだ」

languages.text: "Einige Mysterien können jahrhundertelang in der Leere verschwinden. Wir können uns glücklich schätzen, dass dieses Geheimnis der Dynastie überhaupt aufgedeckt wurde."
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: "Einige Mysterien können jahrhundertelang in der Leere verschwinden. Wir können uns glücklich schätzen, dass dieses Geheimnis der Dynastie überhaupt aufgedeckt wurde."

languages.text: « Certains mystères peuvent tomber dans l'oubli pendant des siècles. La simple découverte de ce secret de la dynastie est déjà une chance remarquable. »
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: « Certains mystères peuvent tomber dans l'oubli pendant des siècles. La simple découverte de ce secret de la dynastie est déjà une chance remarquable. »

languages.text: «Algunos misterios pueden perderse en el vacío durante siglos. Podemos considerarnos afortunados por haber desvelado este secreto de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: «Algunos misterios pueden perderse en el vacío durante siglos. Podemos considerarnos afortunados por haber desvelado este secreto de la dinastía».

languages.text: “有些秘密可能几百年都不会被人发现。我们发现了王朝的这个秘密，我们应当感到庆幸。”
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: “有些秘密可能几百年都不会被人发现。我们发现了王朝的这个秘密，我们应当感到庆幸。”

languages.text: "Bazı sırlar, uçsuzda asırlar boyu yitik kalabilir. Hanedanlığın sırrını ortaya çıkarmayı başardık, şanslı sayılırız."
languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı sırlar, uçsuzda asırlar boyu yitik kalabilir. Hanedanlığın sırrını ortaya çıkarmayı başardık, şanslı sayılırız."

languages.original_text: "Some mysteries can vanish into the void for centuries. We may consider ourselves lucky that this secret of the dynasty was unearthed at all."
